Course Overview

Learn how space technology drives sustainability solutions.

This masterclass explores the intersection of space operations, ESG standards, and climate action. Participants gain practical insights into satellite data, mission planning, and sustainability strategy, equipping them to influence corporate and sector-wide sustainability initiatives.

What You Need

A computer with internet access, curiosity about space technology, and basic knowledge of sustainability or ESG principles.

Learning Outcomes

By the end of the course, participants will be able to integrate space insights into sustainability strategies, reduce environmental impacts of missions, and design actionable ESG-aligned projects.
